title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From enterprise data mesh to AI with Amazon SageMaker Unified Studio (IND3322)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon SageMaker Unified Studio 从企业数据网格到 AI (IND3322)
abstract: Learn how financial institutions are transforming fragmented data landscapes into unified AI-powered platforms using Amazon SageMaker Unified Studio. This session shares domain-driven architecture patterns, automated governance frameworks, and enterprise implementation lessons. We’ll dive deep into multi-account domain strategies, data governance, data-as-a-product approaches, and cross-domain consumption patterns. From there, we’ll see how to seamlessly transition from data preparation to AI/ML experimentation, unlocking new value through machine learning. Discover how Amazon SageMaker Unified Studio enables true data marketplace capabilities with ML workflows, feature stores, and model governance while maintaining banking-grade security throughout the complete analytics-to-AI lifecycle.
abstract_cn: 了解金融机构如何使用 Amazon SageMaker Unified Studio 将碎片化的数据环境转变为统一的 AI 驱动平台。本次会议分享领域驱动架构模式、自动化治理框架和企业实施经验。我们将深入探讨多账户领域策略、数据治理、数据即产品方法以及跨领域消费模式。在此基础上，我们将展示如何从数据准备无缝过渡到 AI/ML 实验，通过机器学习释放新价值。探索 Amazon SageMaker Unified Studio 如何通过 ML 工作流、特征存储和模型治理实现真正的数据市场能力，同时在完整的分析到 AI 生命周期中保持银行级安全性。

presenter.name: Samuel Gordon
presenter.title: Snr Professional Services Consultant - AIML SME
